gpt4o_mini_generate_prompt_structured:
These are aggregated reviews about all AirBNB listings within the zip code '{ZIP_CODE_HERE}' in the iso code '{ISO_CODE_HERE}'. These listings have an average_score of {OVERALL_MEAN}. If the average rating of a listing is at or below 4.0, the listing is doing very poorly and may be removed from the site. If the rating is below 4.5, it is managing, but still doing poorly. If the rating is between 4.5 and 4.8, the listing is doing fairly well. Any ratings above 4.8 are considered exceptionally well received. Do not describe the reviews as 'mixed' or 'average' if the average_score falls into one of these categories. 
The paragraph at the start of the reviews is an overview of the listing. The next section is a list of aspects reviewers viewed positively. The third secion is a list of aspects reviewers viewed negatively. The final sentence is a closing summary of the listing. 
Provide three sections as follows:
1. A brief description of the listings in the area, including informtaion such as the environment and common types of structures in the area. 
2. A list of aspects or features from the listings which are positively viewed and often mentioned. The structure of the list should be topic: reason. The positives section should list as many aspects as there are those that commonly occur across reviews. 
3. A list of issues or criticisms of the listing which are negative sentiments. The structure of the list should be topic: reason. The negatives section should list as many aspects as there are those that commonly occur across reviews. 
Other guidelines:
Keep the details concise.
Do not reference the overall_average in the review.
Do not use a lot of direct quotes from comments.
Any direct quotes from comments should be at most two words long.
Do not use the same quote more than once in the review.
Check that you are not being repetitive in your review. If you are, try to rephrase the sentence. 
Do not use any special formatting in your text, such as bold or italics text. {review_text}
